name: work-token
description: Simple proof of work generation and verification library based on hashcachgen

scripts.build:debug: browserify lib/worker-browser.js > bin/worker-browser.js && brfs lib/async-browser.js > bin/async-browser.js
scripts.build: browserify lib/worker-browser.js | bundle-collapser | uglifyjs --mangle --compress --screw-ie8 > bin/worker-browser.js && brfs lib/async-browser.js > bin/async-browser.js
scripts.test: node test/sync && node test/async && node test/browser
scripts.test:sync: npm run pretest && node test/sync && node test/browser sync
scripts.test:async: npm run pretest && node test/async && node test/browser async
scripts.test:sauce: node test/sync && node test/async && node test/browser sauce
scripts.test:sauce:sync: npm run pretest && node test/sync && node test/browser sauce sync
scripts.test:sauce:async: npm run pretest && node test/async && node test/browser sauce async

author: ForbesLindesay
